after sampling those three beers we visited 
the oktoberfest museum here we learned about

the origins of oktoberfest which date back to 
1810 when a horse race was held to celebrate

the wedding of crown prince ludwig and princess 
therese of saxony hillberghausen the citizens of

munich were invited to attend the festivities held 
on the fields in front of the city gates the event

proved to be very popular and was repeated again 
a year later and then eventually carnival booths

games and other attractions were added 
to the mix and so what started out as

the celebration of a royal wedding turned 
into one of the biggest parties in the world
